#include<stdio.h>
#define gc() getchar()
//#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
inline int fastread()
{
int i=0;
char c=gc();
while(c<48) c=gc();
while(c>47)
{
i=i*10+c-48;
c=gc();
}
return i;
}
int main()
{
     long int t,n;
     double x;
    t=fastread();
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%ld",&n);
        x=((n-100));
        if(x<0) x=0;
        else x=(x*0.1)/20.0;
        printf("%0.6lf\n",x);
    }
    return 0;
}
